description: Take snacking to a whole new level. Old tomatoes, extra avocado, and leftover beans add a tasty waste-free twist to your hummus.
name: Hero Hummus Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 24 tbs olive oil (plus extra to serve)
1 pinch freshly ground black pepper (to taste)

recipeInstructions.text: Place the chickpeas, garlic, nut or seed butter, salt, lemon juice, and 2 tbs of the olive oil in a food processor or blender and whizz until smooth. You may need to stop the motor occasionally and push the mixture back down with a spatula.
Add more olive oil and/or water to reach the desired consistency, if required.
Season with salt and pepper to taste, then drizzle with extra olive oil and sprinkle with herbs, paprika, and dukkah, if using.
Serve with some crunchy vegetables such as capsicum or cucumber to dip, or store your hummus in an airtight container in the fridge for 30 days.
